For RNA extractions, lung lobes were snap-frozen in liquid nitrogen. For flow cytometry, a single cell lung preparation was obtained as previously described
33 . At least 75 µl blood was collected in 1 ml PBS supplemented with 5 mM EDTA. RBCs were removed by lysis with ACK. Cells were re-suspended in FACS buffer (PBS supplemented with 1% BSA, 0.05 mM EDTA) before flow cytometry staining.
